name: Survival Quiz City: Festival Edition
summary:
A new free-to-play version of Survival Quiz City on the Nintendo Switch in Japan and releasing as a new app on Steam without English support, the original Steam release will be shutdown. The game will still have the same game systems as the original along with the new city festival, including various themed events

Player data from the original release on Steam can be transferred starting October 1st until it is shutdown on October 31st and will include some some bonus draw tickets in the new game but it is set to be in Japanese only.
